headline: Zimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust Yopa Chiedza Kune Vanotambura Kumusha
text: Basa rekubatsira vanoshaya chinhu chinonzi nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mudunhu reTexas muAmerica, Advocate James Bayanai, chiri muropa ravo. Kubva muna 2010, Advocate Bayanai kuburikidza nesangano ravo reZimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust, vari kubatsira vana vechikoro pamwe nemhuri dzinoshaya vari mumaruwa muZimbabwe kuburikidza nekuunganidza rubatsiro rwakasiyanasiyana rwunosanganisira mabhuku nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukudzidza. Advocate Bayanai vanoti kubva nguva yavakatanga sangano reZimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust iri, vakwanisa kubatsira zvikoro zvakawanda kwazvo zvemunharaunda yeChirumhanzu mudunhu reMidlands pamwe neHurungwe kuMashonaland West. Vanoti kuburikidza nesanganpo ravo, vana vezvikoro zvakawanda vanoitawo makwikwi ezviperengo, kana kuti Spelling Bee Competition, ayo anozoita kuti vanenge vabudirira vazonokwikwidzana nevamwe vana vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzemuAfrica. Mwedzi wapera Advocate Bayanai nesangano ravo vakatambanudza rubatsiro rwavo vachi[inda mumajeri umo vakawanikwa vachipa rubatsiro rwechikafu pamwe ne wheelchair kuvasungwa vekujeri reChikurubi Maximum Security Prison. Vanoti vakaberekerwa kwaChirumhanzu vakadzidza kuzvikoro zveko pamwe neMutasa mumusha weHighfield, vachizodzokera zvakare kwaHama Secondary School kuChirumhanzu kunoita zvidzidzo zvesekendari, pashure vakazoenda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe kwavakanoita zvidzidzo zvehugweta. Muna 2015 Advocate Bayanai vakazobuda muZimbabwe vachienda kuAmerica kunoita zvidzidzo zvavo zvepamusorosoro zvehugweta paTulane University Law School kudunhu New Orleans, vakazonogara kuDallas mudunhu reTexas mushure mekupedza zvidzidzo zvavo. Advocate Bayanai ndemumwe wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kubatsira kusimudzira hupenyu neraramo zvevanhu vari kumusha paine tarisiro yekuvapa ramangwana rakajeka. No media source currently available

headline: Chikwata cheIMF Chinopeta Rwendo kuZimbabwe Chichirumbidza Mabatirwo eHupfumi, Asi Chichiti Haisati Yave Kukodzera Kupiwa Rubatsiro Rwemari
text: Chikwata che International Monetary Fund (IMF) chichitungamirirwa naVaDhaneshwar Ghura, neMuvhuro chakapeta rwendo rwacho rwemazuva masere muZimbabwe, umo chaiita hurukuro nevakuru vehurumende, vakuru vebhanga guru renyika pamwe nevemabhizimusi pamusoro peshanduko dziri kuitika mune zvehupfumi pamwe nemamiriro ahwo. Mugwaro ravakaburitsa mushure mekupeta rwendo urwu, VaGhura vakati hupfumi hweZimbabwe hwaratidza kusimba kukuru nekumuka kwahwo munguva yakaoma. Vakati hondo iri pakati peRussia neUkraine, kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura pamwe nemitengo yezvinhu iri pamusoro zviri kukanganisa hupfumi nemagariro evanhu muZimbabwe, izvo zvakasakadzwa kare nedenda reCovid-19. IMF yakapembedzawo matanho ari kuitwa nehurumende ekudzikamisa mutengo wemari yekunze, asi ichitiwo panodiwa mamwe matanho ekunyatsodzikamisa hupfumi ane hupenyu hunoenda mberi. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakapembedzwa neIMF nekukwanisa kubhadhara chikwereti chayo kuIMF muna 2016, sangano rinokweretsa mari iri rakati haisati yasvika pakuti ikwanise kupiwa rubatsiro rwemari nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadra kwayo zvikwereti zvayo zvekunze. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi pamwe nekudyidzana kwenyika dzepasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti IMF yakarumbidza Zimbabwe nematanho ayakatora ekukwanisa kuraramisa hupfumi hwenyika, panguva iyo dzimwe nyika pasi rose dzaitarisana nematambudziko aitosvitsa pakubviswa kwevatungamiri pazvigaro. Asi Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti havaoni hurumende ichibudirira kuzdzisa zvayakakomekedzwa kuti izadzise nekuti zvinhu zvave nemakore ichiudzwa nezvazvo asi isina matanho ainotora. No media source currently available

headline: Bhanga Guru Rinoparura Hurongwa Hutsva hweMari
text: Bank guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe (RBZ), raparura hurongwa hwemari hutsva kwekuti mabhanga munyika atange kutenga mari yekunze izvo rinoti zvichauraya musika mutema. RBZ inoti hurongwa hutswa uhu huchaita kuti mari yekunze iwande munyika, kudzikisa mutengo wemari yekunze, pamwe nekudzikisa mitengo yezvinhu izvo zvange zvave kuvhiringa raramo yevanhu munyika. Vachiparura hurongwa hwawo hweMonetary Policy, gavhuna weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vati kuti izvi zvitange kuitika, mari yese yeReal Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) nemabhondi iri mumabhanga, yave kutorwa semaRTGS dollars uye mari iyi ndiyo ichange yave kuchinjwa nemadhora ekuAmerica kana dzimwe mari dzekunze. Vati mari iyi ndiyo ichange yave kushandiswa kutenga mari yekunze pamusika wemumabhanga kana kuti Inter-Bank Foreign Exchange Market. VaMangudya vati bhanga ravo ratora matanho ekuti mutengo wemari yekunze hausi kuzokwira zvakanyanya uyewo vati vachange vachiongorora kuti mabhanga ari kutenga nekutengesa mari yekunze zviri pamutemo. Vatiwo veruzhinji vachange vave kukwanisa kutengesa mari yavo yekunze mumabhanga. Vatiwo vaya vanotumirwa mari kana kutambira mari kubva kunze kwenyika vacharamba vachipihwa mari dzavo ari madhora ekuAmerica. VaMangudya vati vanoona sekuti matanho avatora achabvisa musika mutema wemari, kudereredza mutengo wemari yekunze, izvo vati zvichaderedza mitengo yezvinhu munyika. Vatiwo izvi ndozvange zviri kudiwa nevemabizimisi. Muzvinabhisimisi, VaOswald Binha, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa naVaMangudya ndizvo chaizvo zvavange vakatarisirira sezvo zvange zviri pachena kuti huremu hwema bond notes hauenderani nehuremu hwemadhora ekuAmerica. Asi vati pachine mamwe matanho anofanira kutorwa nehurumende kuti zvinhu zvinyatsofamba zvakanaka munyaya dzemabhizisimisi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaPersistence Gwanyanywa, vaudza Studio7 kuti danho ratorwa neRBZ rakanaka chose uye zvinogona kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze yakawanda. Asi vati RBZ inofanira kushanda zvakanyanya kudzivirira zvipingaidzo zvinogona kumuka apo matanho aya anotanga kushanda. VaMangudya vati vemakambani vakawanda vange vave kutenga mari yekunze pamukoto kuitira kuti vatenge zvinhu zvinokosha. Pari zvino dhora rimwe rekuAmerica rinokosha mana mana kana kudarika pamukoto. VaMangudya vati matanho avatora achaderedza mutengo uyu zvakanyanya uye kana izvi zvaitika, mitengo yezvinhu ichadzikirira. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemari, uye vaimbove gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zvataurwa nehurumende zvinoratidza kuti dhora remuZimbabwe radzoka pachishandiswa rimwe zita. VaBiti, avo vakayambira nyika kuti hurumende iri kuda kudzosa dhora remunyika nerweseri, vanoti havasi kufara nehurongwa hwagavhuna webhanga guru, sezvo mari dzevanhu dziri mumabhangi dzasiyiwa dzisina kuchengetedzwa nehurongwa hwaturwa nhasi. VaBiti vanotiwo vanhu vanofanirwa kutarisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu uye kushaikwa kwezvinhu zvizhinji munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dhora reMunyika Rotanga Kudonha Zvakanyanya
text: Dhora remuZimbabwe riri kuramba richishaya simba zvakanyanya zvave kupa kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichiita chamurambamhuru sezvakamboitika kumakore ekuma2007 na2008. Dhora remuAmerica riri kutengwa nemadhora makumi matatu nemaviri kusvika makumi mana. Zvekudya, mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nezvinhu zvakawanda zvave kudhura zvakanyanya zvekuti vamwe vave kuti danho rekushandisa dhora remunyika raramba kushanda. Vachitaura kuKuwadzana pahurongwa hwekuchengeta nzvimbo iyi muna Ndira, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati vainge vodzora dhora remunyika sezvo pasina nyika ingararame isina mari yayo. Asi mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa, VaNelson Chamisa, vakatiwo zvekuda kushandisa dhora remunyika haishande. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti vezvematongerwo enyika panyaya yemari handivo vanoudza musika wemari zvekuita. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vatendawo kuti zvinhu zvave kutengeswa nemari yekunze. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaChris Mugaga, vanotiwo panoda kutoisa musoro pamwe chete kuti dhora rishande zvakanaka. Asi Muzvinafundo Mugano vanoti hapana chembwa tenzi vararira mutakura nekuti kana iyo hurumende yave kuramba kutambira dhora remunyika. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vatiwo kumushandi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, iri kupota ichidhindha mari izvo zvinogona kuti nyika irambe iri kumawere. Asi gavhuna weRBZ, Dr John Mangudya, vanoti aya manyepo. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari dzekunze kusanganisira dhora rekuAmerica muna 2019 asi ikazoti yave kudzokera mukushandisa dhora remunyika chete gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi Votambira Kurudziro Yekuti Varimi Vatengese Dzimwe Mombe
text: Rimwe sangano revarimiri, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Rimwe sangano revarimi, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaJeremiah Tevera, vanoti sangano ravo ragara richikurudzira varimi vari mumatunhu ane nzara kuti vatengese zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavo kuitira kuti vawane mari yekutenga chikafu chekupa kune zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavanenge vasara nazvo. “Ishoko rakanaka ravari kutaura asi isu sesangano tinoona sekunge ranga ranonoka kuuya nekuti zvipfuwo zviri kufa,” VaTevera vanodaro. Mutevedzeri wegurukurota rezvekurima vakanangana nezvipfuwo, VaPaddy Zhanda, vanonzi nedandemutande renhau reThe Source vari kukurudzirawo varimi kuti vaite nhimuramiswe, vasachiva kuverenga mombe dzakawanda asi idzo dzichizofa dzoga nenzara. Vazhanda vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kushanya kumatunhu eMatabeland South neMatabeleland North neChitatu kuti vasangane nevarimi kuti vakurukure nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu pamwe nezvekurudziro yavo iyi. Takundikana kubata VaZhanda kuti tinzwe nezvehurongwa hwavo uhwu. Mombe dzinodarika zviuru zvinomwe dzinonzi dzafa mukati memwedzi mina yapfuura nekuda kwekushaiwa mafuro. Hurumende mwedzi wapera yakaparura chirongwa chekubatsira varimi nechikafu chezvipfuyo zvavo mudunhu reChiredzi, asi vamwe varimi vanonzi vari kukundikana kuwana madhora masere ekuti vatenge tsaga rimwe chete rechikafu ichi. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMTA Inoti Covid-19 Yava Kupararira Kubva Muzvikoro Ichienda Kumisha
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers’ Association (ZIMTA) rinoti kunyange haro richirumbidza basa riri kuitwa nehurumende mukurwisa kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19 muzvikoro, zvikwanisiro zvishoma uye mari yezvikoro yekuti zvirwisane nedenda iri pamwe nekuchengetedza hutano hwevana vechikoro nevadzidzisi haisi kusvika kuzvikoro. Mutungamiri weZIMTA, VaRichard Gundani, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vechikoro vanofanirwa kupiwa zvikamu zvavo zvemushonga wenhomba uye zvikoro zvinofanirwa kupiwa zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodikanwa, vachiti chirwere ichi chavakupararira kubva muzvikoro chichiendeswa kumisha nevana vechikoro. VaGundani vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti panovhurwa zvikoro gore rinouya, vana vasazonzi vadzidze vari kudzimba dzavo, vachiti hurumende inogonawo kuchitanga kugadzirisa zvose zvinodiwa kana vana vechikoro vakazonzi vadzidze pamadandemutande vari kudzimba dzavo. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vauza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kuzvirova dundundu nekuti irikugona kurwisa denda reCovid-19 muzvikoro. No media source currently available

headline: Mitumbi yeVakafa muTsaona yeCyclone Idai Yofukurwa Kubva muMadhaka
text: Mumiriri weManicaland muparamende pasi pehurongwa hwe Proportional Represenation, Amai Lynette Karenyi, veMDC, vanoti basa rekutsvaga mitumbi yevanhu vangadai vakafuchirwa nemadhaka mutsaona yeCyclone Idai pamwe nevamwe vangadai vachiri vapenyu riri kuenderera mberi muChimanimani neChipinge. Amai Karenyi vanoti dzimwe mhuri dziri kuita zvekufukura mitumbi yehama dzadzo dzakafushirwa mumadhaka nematombo pakawondomoka gomo, pamwe nepasi pedzimba dzakaparadzwa vanhu vareremo, mimwe mitumbi ichiwanikwa munzizi. Asi vanoti dambudziko guru richiripo nderekuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro, zvikuru rwechikafu, sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kunzvimbo dziri kure dzakaita sekwaMutsvangwa, vachinzi havasati vakwanisa kuwana rubatsiro rwezvekudya. Vanotiwo mishonga, zvikuru yemaARV, yakwanisa kusvitswa pakirinika yeMutsvangwa, uyewo madzimai matatu pamadzimai gumi nevatatu vakazvitakura vari pakirinika iyi vanonzi vakwanisa kusunuguka zvisina dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotambira Dzimwe Nhomba dzeCovid-19 Kubva KuChina
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weMuvhuro yakatambira dzimwe nhomba dzedenda reCovid-19 kubva kuChina panguva iyo paine kurudziro yekuti hurumende ishande zvakasimba kuti nhomba idzi dzitengwe dzakawanda kuitira kuti dzikwanire veruzhinji. Zimbabwe yawana dzimwe nhomba zviuru mazana manomwe (700 000) dzeSinopharm dzabva kuChina. Nhomba idzi dzasvika munyika manheru ano mushure mekusvika kwenhomba zviuru mazana masere (800 000) dzakabva kuChina zvakare. Mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid 19 muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kushanda zvakasimba kuti nhomba dzeCovid 19 dziwande munyika kuitira kuti dzishandiswe mukurwisa denda iri. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachienda munzvimbo dzose dziri kubayiwa nhomba idzi kuitira kuti vakwanise kubayiwa vozvidzivirirawo kudenda reCovid 19. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kutenga nhomba dzakawanda nguva imwechete kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasanetseke kuwana nhomba idzi. Hurumende inoti vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yekutamba kusvika mukupera kwezuva reChitatu vave miriyoni imwe nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevashanu (1 562 285) uye vakabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana manomwe zvine gumi nezvitatu nezana rimwe chete nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete (713 131). Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pachakatanga kupinda munyika ichi vave zviuru zana nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe (103 567) uye vapora vave zviuru makumi manomwe nechimwe nemazana matatu ane makumi masere nevatatu (71 383). Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi matanhatu (60) vakafa nezuro zvabva zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muZimbabwe pazviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana (3 340). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba kuvanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Kubviswa kweLockdown Kuchanetsa Sezvo Vanhu Vakawanda Vasati Vaongororwa Covid-19
text: Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti danho rekuwedzera kana kusawedzera mazuva ekuti nyika irambe yakavharwa, richanetsa kutora sezvo vanhu vazhinji munyika vasina kuongororwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvinoitika apo hurumende ichiti yave kutora matanho matsva ekuti vanhu vakawanda vaongororwe, zvikuru vari munzvimbo dzine vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19. MuZimbabwe mava nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vatatu vafa nacho, asi pasi rose riine vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe vafa neCovid-19 kubva zvayakatanga kuChina gore rapera. Munyori musangano iri, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika harwuna kuongororwa kuti rwune chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete panguva iyo nyika yakavharwa kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe akatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika zvichaita kuti hurumende itemeseke musoro kuti nyika yoramba yakavharwa here kana kuti kwete pachapera nguva yakatarwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Pari zvino, bazi rezvehutano rinoti raongorora vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu chetekuti vane chirwere ichi here kana kuti Havana munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu. Nekuda kweizvi, VaMatara vati zvinonetsa kuti hurumende itore danho rine hudzamu isina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwekuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kusvika pari zvino hunoratidza kuti kuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika hakuna chakwabatsira. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vakurudzirawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vambomira kufamba-famba kwavari kuita. Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti vari pakati pahurongwa hwekutenderera nenyika yose vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 ichi uye kuona kuti veruzhinji vari kutevedzera here kurudziro yavo yekuti veruzhinji vagare kudzimba senzira yekuderedza kuapararira kwechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kutivachazoongorora pakupera kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe avakatara kuti veruzhinji vange vari kudzimba senzira yekuderedza mikana yekupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti zvinokodzera here kuti veruzhinji varambe vari mudzimba kana kuti kwete. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi munyori mubazi ravo, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti komiti yakaumbwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuti itungamire nyaya dzekurwisa chirwere che Coronavirus yeInter-Ministerial Taskforce on Covid-19 inotungamirwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, yakabvumirana kuti patorwe matanho akasimba ekuti vanhu vazhinji munyika vaongororwe kuti havana chirwere cheCvoid-19 here. Gwaro raburitswa naDoctor Mahomva iri rinoti vanhu vese vanga vachienda kumabasa panguva iyo nyika yanga yakavharwa, kunyanya vashandi vehurumende, vachaongororwa kuti havana kutapukirwa nechirwere ichi here. Doctor Mahomva vati munhu wese anofungidzirwa kuti ane chirwere ichi anosungirwa kuongororwa, uye vose vari kupinda munyika vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi pamwe nevane zvirwere zvedzihwa vanofanira kuongororwa zvakare. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vakwegura vane makore makumi matanhatu zvichikwira vari muzvipatara vane zvirwere zvakaita se asthma, shuga, BP, nezvirwere zvemoyo vanofanirawo kuongororwa zvakare. Vati zvose izvi zvichaitwa kuti hurumende inyatsoziva kuti nyika yakamira papi chaizvo pachirwere cheCovid-19. Pari zvino, chirwere cheCovid-19, icho chakatangira kuChina, chinonzi nehurumende chauraya vanhu vatatu munyika, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevasere, ukuwo pasi rose, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri vabatwa neCovid-19, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvonomwe, vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCoronavirus muHarare Voda Kusvika paZana
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muHarare chete hwasvika pamakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kana kuti 98 apo bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika yose hwasvika pamazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemapfumamwe kana kuti 279. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana uye vapora vave makumi matatu nevatatu kana kuti 33. Vanhu gumi nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera vose vakadzoka kubva kuSouth Africa. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi, ichiteverwa neMatabeleland South ne Masvingo. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambirawo kuti munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vadzoka kubva kunze kwenyika zvikuru vanouya nemabhazi hadzina kushambidzika uye kune huori hunotyisa vamwe vachinzi vabhadhare mari yechiokomuhomwe vasati vabuditswa kana kuti kuvhenekwa. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano VaNick Mangwana vachinyora padandemutande ravo vakatenda kune munhu akadzingwa basa paBelvedere Teachers College nenyaya yehuori uye inyaya yavanoda kuferefeta. Mutungamiri wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti hurumende inofanira kuona kuti munzvimbo dziri kugara vanhu vanenge vadzoka kubva kune dzimwe nyika kana kuti maqurantine centres dzive dzine hutsanana kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nemana nematanhatu kana kuti 184, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvishanu nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kuti 5,071. Vapora vanodarika zviuru makumi manomwe nemasere kana kuti 81,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti kuti 6,9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 400,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million. No media source currently available

headline: POLITICAL PANEL
text: Vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vanoti vari kushuvira kuti dai munyika maitwa nhaurirano dzekutsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Izvi ndizvowo zviri kukurudzirwa nevatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemapato avo, vachiti iyi ndiyo yega nzira inokwanisa kugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika, anosanganisira ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezveupfumi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kutanga kwemwedzi uno vakashevedzera musangano wekutanga wenhaurirano dzakadai, uyo wakapindwa nevemamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, kunze kwebato guru rinopikisa reMDC nemutungamiri waro VaNelson Chamisa. Vemakereke vakashevedzerawo musangano wenhaurirano asi mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa havana kupinda musangano uyu, kunyange hazvo VaChamisa vakapindawo rwendo rwuno. Asi vakawanda vanoti neimwe nzira VaMnangagwa vakapinda musangano uyu sezvo vakanga vakamirirwa nasachigaro webato ravo, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri pamwe nevamwe vakuru mubato ravo reZanu PF. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vashevedza zvakare mapato ose akapinda mumusangano wekutanga kune dzimwe nhaurirano dzechipiri mangwana, idzo diznonzi dziri kuitirwa zvakare kumuzinda wavo weState House. Kunyange hazvo mamwe mapato audza Studio 7 kuti achaenda kumusangano uyu, MDC inotungamirirwa naVaChamisa inoti zvakare haisi kuenda kumusangano uyu. Izvi zvave kuita kuti vana veZimbabwe vabvunzane kuti saka matambudziko ari munyika anogadziriswa sei kana paita kudhonzerana kwakadai? Mukuzeya nezvenyaya iyi, tabata munyori mukuru weMDC, VaDouglas Mwonzora, pamwe nenhengo yeCentral Committee ye Zanu PF VaJoseph Tshuma. Tatanga nekubvunza vaMwonzora kuti sei vasiri kuenda kumusangano uyu.

headline: VaMugabe Vokurudzira VaTrump Kusaita Zvemangoromera
text: No media source currently available Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakakatyamadza vanhu vakawanda pasi rose nemusi weChina nekushora kwavakaita mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vachiti vanofanira kukurudzira runyararo pasi rose kwete kuda kuita zvemangoromera. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya kuNew York muAmerica kumusangano mukuru wepagore weUnited Nations General Assembly, UNGA. Mutungamiri wenyika haana kutaura nezvenyaya dzezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nyaya inova yange yave rwiyo rwavo kumusangano uyu. VaMugabe vakati hapana chakaipa kuti VaTrump vazviridzire hwamanda asi vakati inofanira kunge ichitaura nezverunyararo pasi rose. VaTrump vakasiya vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rose vasina neremuromo mushure mekunge vayambira North Korea kuti vaigona kuiparadza ikaramba ichipinda nemwenje mudziva ichisvokosva America neshamwari dzayo nekupota ichivhundutsira nekukanda zvombo zvemuchadenga. Mutungamiri weAmerica akatsoropodzawo Iran, Venezuela nedzimwe nyika dzavakati hadziremekedze kodzero dzevanhu. VaMugabe vakasetsa vamwe vatungamiri mudare iri apo vakafananidza VaTrump naGoriyati wemubhaibheri anongoziva kushandisa chisimba. Vakatyorazve vanhu mbabvu apo vakati VaTrump vanofanira kuridza havo hwamanda yavo asi vachiita izvi mukuunza runyararo munyika dzepasi rose. VaMugabe vakashorawo America nekubuda muchibvumirano chakanangana nekuchengetedza mamiriro ekunze cheParis Climate Agreement. Asi VaMugabe vakati Zimbabwe haisi kuzongorega nyika dzakabudirira idzi dzichityora zvisungo zvechibvumirano ichi. VaMugabe vakatiwo Zimbabwe ine hukama hwakanaka nesangano reUnited Nations asi vakati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti bazi rakakosha reUnited Nations Security Council rivandudzwe. Dare reSecurity Council rine nyika shanu chete dzisingabude mudare iri uye dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dzinoti Russia, America, China, France neBritain, uye nyika gumi dzisina masimba dzinoita majanho kugara mudare iri kwemakore maviri. Panyika gumi idzi pane nyika nhatu chete dzemuAfrica dzinoti Ethiopia, Senegal neEgypt. Asi Africa nedzimwe nyika dzinoda kuti nyika dziri mudare iri dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dziwedzerwe kubva pashanu dziripo. Sachigaro weMDC-T muAmerica, VaDen Moyo, vashora zvikuru VaMugabe vachiti vanoda kupindira nyaya dzisinei neZimbabwe uye vanoshora vatungamiri vavanoti vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu asi ivo kunyika kwavo vasingaremekedze vanovapikisa uye vachitonga nedemo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naMuzvare Tsitsi Chiriseri, chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chakaratidzira muNew Yorl chichishora matongero aVaMugabe. Muzvare Chiriseri vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi nekuti dai VaMugabe vaiita zvavanotaura, dai Zimbabwe isiri mukanwa mamupere. Asi mumwe muzvinafundo paMalone University kuOhio muAmerica, VaMoses Rumano, vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aVaMugabe ekutsiura VaTrump. Kunyange hazvo zvakabuda pachena kuti VaMugabe vakange vachinetsekana nekufamba pavakange vachienda kunotura mashoko avo kudare reGeneral Assembly, vakawanda vanoti vange vachiratidza kuti hutano hwavo huri nani. Musangano weUNGA uyu ndewechimakumi manomwe nembiri.

headline: VaMatemadanda Vopomera VaMugabe Mhosva Yose yeGukurahundi
text: Munyori wesangano revakamborwa hondo yerusununguko, VaVictor Matemadanda, vanoti hapana zvazvinobatsira kuti nyika irambe ichitsvaka munhu wekupomera mhosva yeGukurahundi izvo zviri pachena kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vanofanirwa kubvunzwa uye kutsanangura mhosva yavakapara iyi. VaMatemadanda vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vanofanira kutaurira vanhu kuti zvipangamazano zvavo vaive vanaani panguva yeGukurahundi. Vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vaive mukuru wemauto, kana kuti "Commander-in-Chief", panguva iyi, uye semukuru wemauto, mutungamiri wenyika ndiye anotanga kana kumisa hondo. “Hapana minister kana commander wemauto ane simba rekutanga hondo. Hondo inotangwa napresident, yomiswa napresident,” VaMatemadanda vanodaro. Vanoti hurongwa hwemauto eFifth Brigade hwakatoshevedzerwa varairidzi vakabva kuNorth Korea, nekudaro hazvishandi kuramba vanhu vachinyenyeredza dambudziko rakatarisana nenyika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mashoko aVaMatemadanda ekuda kuedza kuchenura mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa haana zvaanobatsira, sezvo VaMnangagwa vaive ivo gurukota rezvekugadzikana kwenyika vachiona nezvevasori panguva iyi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti maoko aVaMnangagwa akangosvibawo sezvakaita aVaMugabe panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Chenjerai Hove Anorangarirwa Zvine Mutsindo muHarare
text: Vanyori, vana nyanduri, vaimbi pamwe nehama neshamwari dzemushakabvu, VaChenjeral Hove, kubva mativi mana enyika, dzakasangana muHarare nemusi weMugovera manheru dzichipemberera hupenyu hwavo pamwe nemabasa avo munyaya dzekunyora mabhuku nenhetembo. Paive nemufaro mukuru kuQueensade Sports Club uye mhuri yaVaHove inoti yakafara zvikuru kuti shamwari dzavo pamwe nevamwe vavaishanda navo vakaronga mutambo wakadai uyo vakati wakabudirira zvikuru. Mudzimai wamuchakabvu, Amai Tekla Hove, vakatsanangura murume wavo semunhu aive nerudo nemhuri nebasa rake uye vanoti vanotenda chose kuti vakadzisisa vana vavo uye vanokwanisa kurarama pasina dambudziko kunyange baba vavo vasisipo Amai Hove vakati chimwe chinonyanyovafadza rudo rwakaratidzwa neshamwari dzemurume wavo nevamwe vavaishanda navo uye vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakasiya vadyara rudo. Mmwe mwana VaHove, Tanatswa, akaudza Studio7 kuti baba vake munhu aive nerudo uye izvi zvakaratidzwa nekuuya nehuwandu kwakaita vanhu, vanyori, shamwari dzavo, vaimbi nevanhuwo zvavo kumutambo wekupemberera hupenyu hwavo nekuvarangarira. Mumwe mwana wavo, Tafadzwa, akatiwo mafariro aita vanhu neMugovera ndozvaigara vachiita nebaba vavo uye zvinorwadzo kuti havasisipo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, avo vakaridzawo mimhanzi pamutambo wekurangarira VaHove, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzero kunge varipowo sezvo VaHove vaive mumwe wevanhu vakavamba sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights. VaMichael Mabwe, avo vanoitawo nhetembo dzekukurudziro kodzero dzevanhu, vanoti vanorangarira VaHove nemabasa avo uye mabasa avo ndivo akaitawo kuti vapinde mumabasa ekusimudzira kodzero dzevanhu. Munyori wesangao rinomirira vanyori reZimbabwe Writers Association, Memory Chirere, akati mutambo wekurangarira VaHove wakafamba zvakanaka uye zvinoratidza kufamba kwavaiita nevamwe vavo. Vamwe vanyori, vaimbi nananyanduri vakapinda mumutambo weMugovera vanosanganisira, David Mungoshi, Conte Mhlanga, Shimmer Chinodya, Virginia Phiri, Hope Masike nevamwe. VaHove vaive nemukurumbira uye vakahwina mibairo yakwanda yekunyora mabhuku. Mibayiro iyi inosanganisira we Noma Aaward for Publishing in Africa. Vakashayikira kuNorway munaChinkunguru uko vange vave kugara muhupoteri. Asi vakazochengetwa kumusha kwavo kuGokwe. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano ravanaChiremba reZADHR Roshora Mabatirwo eNhengo dzeZanu PF Dziri muHusungwa
text: Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemabatirwo ari kuitwa vamwe vevaimbove vakuru-vakuru mubato re Zanu-PF, avo vakasungwa svondo rapera. Munyori mukuru we sangano iri, Dr. Evans Masitara, vanoti sangano ravo rinoshora zvakasimba zvakaitwa nemauto nemapurisa kuvasungwa ava uye vari kuedza zvikuru kuti vapiwe mvumo yekuzvionera voga vasungwa ivavo sezvo vainzi havana kubatwa zvakanaka pavakanga vari muhusungwa, umo vanonzi vakashungurudzwa nokurohwa. Dr Masitara vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa kuvasungwa hazvibumidzwe nebumbiro yemitemo. VaChombo, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuwori, vakasungwa pamwe nemunyori muboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaKudzanai Chipanga, pamwe nemurongi wemisangano muboka revechidiki, VaInnocent Hamandishe. VaChombo naVachipanga vari kumirirwa negweta rine mukurumbira, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, uye vari kutarisirwa kudzoka mudare nemusi weMuvhuro 27 Mbudzi. No media source currently available

headline: Hatikwate: Chegutu Pirates
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu cheChegutu Pirates chinoti hachina chimwe chachinovhunduka apo chatarisana nekusangana neSimba Bhora FC mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament svondo rino.   Mitambo iyi ichaona zvikwata zvange zviri muTop 8 zvichibandana apo ligi reNorthen Region Soccer League (NRSL) rakamboenda pazororo. Mumitambo iyi, kunze kweChegutu Pirates ichisangana neSimba Bhora FC, Herentals U20 FC ichatamba neBlack Mambas FC, Golden Eagles ichitatsurana neNgezi U19 FC uye Commando Bullets ichibandana neTrojan Stars FC.   Munyori mukuru weChegutu Pirates, Jeffrey Wachiseka, anoti vagadzirira mutambo uyu uye hapana chikwata chavanotya.   “Zvikwata zvose zvikuru, kusanganisira iyo Simba Bhora, tiri kusangana nayo svondo rino mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament, takatombosangana nayo tikasvitsana kumiganhu.   “Haina kutikunda uye hatisati tambokundwa nezvikwata zvikuru, taitozvikunda. Saka tiri kuzvitemba kuti tine mukana mukuru wekufambira mberi mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Wachiseka.   Murairidzi weNgezi Under-19 FC, Klifton Kadurira, anoti chikwata chavo chiri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye vanoda kubika vatambi vechidiki avo vanozotumira kuchikwata chevakuru.    Klifton Kadurira   “Isu tinofara kuve pakati pezvikwata zvisere zvakabudirira kuti zvigokwikwidza mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament. Zvinorakidza kuti basa ratiri kuita rekubika vechidiki riri kufamba negwara chairo.   “Kutaura kuno, tine vatambi vatatu avo vave kutotambira muchikwata chevakuru. Saka ticharamba tichisevenza nevechidiki tichivabika.   “Mutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup tiri kuona kuti uri kusimudzira vatambi vedu vazhinji,” anodaro Kadurira.   Zvakadaro, neMugovera svondo rino apo Simba Bhora FC iri kutamba neChegutu Pirates, nemusi weSvondo kuchasangana Herantals U20 neBlack Mambas.

headline: Vatsigiri vava kutenderwa munhandare
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vakabaiwa majekiseni ose ekudzivirira Covid-19 vave kutenderwa kuona mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup. Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) richazivisa kuti chikumbiro chavo chekuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup inge iine vatsigiri 2 000 munhandare chatambirwa.   Mutsamba yakanyorwa neSRC, akafanobata chigaro chadirector general – Sebastain Garikai – anoti vatsigiri 2 000 vachaona mitambo iyi vanofanirwa kunge vakabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 uye pose pavanoenda kumitambo iyi vagare vakapfeka mamasiki nekutevedzera matanho ose ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Chikumbiro chenyu chekuti vatsigiri vaone nhabvu vari munhandare chatambirwa. Saka vatsigiri vose vari muZone 3 neZone 4 vanofanirwa kuuya nemakadhi anoratidza kuti vakabaiwa majekiseni ose eCovid-19 pamwe nezvitupa zvavo kunhandare pavanenge vachipinda. “Naizvozvo, tinokurudzira kuti matikiti ekupinda mumitambo iyi atengeswe mitambo isati yatanga kuitira panhandare pasazoita nyonga-nyonga uye tinotarisira kuti pave nemagedhi akasiyana anopinda nekubuda nevanhu.   “Mazita evatsigiri aya anofanirwa kunge akatonyoreswa kare zvekuti pakupinda munhandare pane vanenge vachiongorora. Kana munhu zita rake risipo, haatenderwe kupinda munhandare macho.   “Mitemo iyi nemimwe ikoshesei uye ngaitevedzerwe nekuti mukasaitedzera zvinotituma kuti timise vatsigiri vacho kuuya kuzoona mitambo iyi,” anodaro Garikai.

headline: Ticharwa semvumba: Siyachitema
text: MURAIRIDZI weGlow Petroleum Queens, Perpetua Siyachitema, otsidza kuti chikwata chake chicharwa semvumba mwaka wegore rino zvichitevera kuhwina kwachakaita mukombe weRainbow Amateur Netball League (RANL).   Svondo radarika, Glow Petroleum Queens yakapihwa mubairo weUS$3 000 nemenduru yegoridhe pamabiko akaitwa muHarare ekupemberera shasha dzakahwina mwaka wadarika weRANL.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti chikwata chake chakatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka wadarika izvo zvakachiona chichingokundwa mumutambo mumwe chete murwendo rwavo rwekurwira mukombe weRANL.   Siyachitema, uyo aimbove mutambi wechikwata ichi nechenyika chemaGems, anoti mwaka uno vanoda kurwa semvumba kuti vachengetedze mukombe wavo naizvozvo vanofanirwa kupedza mwaka wose vasina kumbokundwa.   “Sechikwata, tiri kufara nekuhwina kwatakaita mwaka wadarika, zvainge zvakaoma nekuti takazomirira pazuva rekupedzisira kuziviswa kunzi tisu shasha dzeRANL dza2021.   “Saka tichienda mumwaka wegore rino, tinoda kurwa semvumba tihwine mitambo yedu yose uye zvimwe zvikwata zvizive kuti hatisi kuita zvekutamba asi kuti tiri shasha chaidzo. Tikahwina mitambo yedu yose, tinoziva kuti hatizobatire hana dzedu mumaoko sezvatakazoita pazuva rekupedzisira remwaka wadarika apo takange tave kuda kuti ZRP Mambas Queens ikundwe kuitira kuti tizogadzwa humambo hwedu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Zvichitevera kuhwina kwakaita chikwata chake mukombe weRANL, Siyachitema ndiye akabva asarudzwa kuve murairidzi wemwaka wa2021 (Coach of the Year).   ZRP Mambas, iyo yakapedza iri pechipiri, yakahwiniswawo US$2 000 kuchiti Correctional Queens ikapihwa US$1 500 mushure mekutora nhamba yechitatu. Mutambi weCorrectional Queens, Kudakwashe Mushonge, ndiye akahwina mubairo wePlayer of the Season, Judith Mudekwe weTenax akatora weRookie of the Season uyewo Pauline Jani weZRP Mambas Queens ndiye akahwina weGolden Hand.   Zvakadaro, mwaka weRANL wa2022 uri kutanga svondo rino.

headline: Voronga kusimudzira netball
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa mumutambo wenetball, Perpetual Siyachitema, anoti iye nevamwe vakambotamba mumutambo uyu vane hurongwa hwekuusimudzira nechinangwa chekubika vatambi vechikwata chenyika chemaGems chemangwana.   Siyachitema vazhinji vanomuziva nechiremerera chaakapihwa icho chichagara munhoroondo yemutambo wenetball munyika muno izvo zvakamuona achitungamira vatambi vemaGems kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland, munaChikunguru gore rapera.   Achibva kumakwikwi aya, Siyachitema akasvika ndokusendeka kutamba netball ndokutanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   Parizvino ari kurairidza chikwata cheGlow Queens icho chinokwikwidza muNetball Super League.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti ari kumhanya-mhanya zvikuru kuronga nevamwe vakambotamba mutambo uyu vekumapurovhinzi akasiyana kuti vasimudzire netball.   “Masvondo adarika, takasangana sevatambi vakambotamba netball kare tikambobandana mumutambo uyu. Tapedza, takagara pasi ndokukurukura kuti todii kuti tibatsirane pakusimudzira mutambo uyu. Ini ndave kurairidza mutambo uyu saka ndinoda chaizvo kuti vandakatamba navo kare vandibatsire muhurongwa hwangu uhu kuti ndifambe naho,” anodaro.   Siyachitema anoti shuviro yake kuti vese vakambotamba mutambo uyu vawanikwe vachiita mabasa akasiyana anosanganisira kurairidza kana kupinda muzvigaro zvekutungamira netball.   “Sevatambi vakambotamba mutambo uyu, zvakakosha chaizvo kuti tiwanikwe tichitora mabasa akasiyana uye tichironga kuti mutambo uyu wofamba sei. Isu takambotamba uye tinoziva zvinenge zvichiitika saka tinofanirwa kupinda mumutambo uyu toitawo mabasa ekuusimudzira.   “Saka tiri kutenderera mapurovhinzi akasiyana tichitamba nekukurukura neshasha dzakambotamba netball tichironga kuti toita sei kuti netball iende kumberi,” anodaro Siyachitema.

headline: Kasikana (8) shasha yemotor-cross
text: KASIKANA kemakore masere okuberekwa koita zvinorova mumutambo wemotor-cross izvo zviri kukaona kachitatsurana nevakomana vakuru kwakari mumujaho yakasiyana.   Kare mujaho wemotor-cross waizivikanwa uri wevarume asi kuzouya kwakaita Tanya Muzinda, uyo akwanisa kunokwikwidza kunyika dzakasiyana dzekunze achihwina mikombe yakawanda, kwabva kwavhurira mikana vamwe vasikana vakaita saMufaro Kabasa (8) uyo ave kutevera mumatsimba ake.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Mufaro anoti chishuwo chake kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe sezvinoitwa naTanya kuburikidza nekuhwina mibairo yakawanda kunze kwenyika.   “Ndakazviona kuti hapana mutambo unonzi ndewevakomana chete, isu vasikana tinogona kuzviitawo uye pasina chinotikanganisa.   “Ndakazvarwa ndichingofarira kuchovha bhasikoro uye ndichikwikwidza nevakomana kumaraini. Pandakanzwa nezvaTanya ndipo ndakati ndinokwanisa kuzviitawo uye ndokutanga kukwikwidza kuDonnybrook.   “Hapana chinombonditadzisa kusvika kure nekuti zvese zviripo zvinondibatsira kuti ndibudirire,” anodaro Mufaro. Shasha iyi parizvino iri kuita Grade 4 pachikoro cheGroombridge Primary, muHarare uye anoti dzidzo ndiwo musimboti wezvose muhupenyu hwake nekudaro anoikoshesa sezvaanoita mutambo wemotor-cross.   Anoti paanoenda kuchikoro, haasiye mukurumbira waave nawo uchimupinda mumusoro asi anongoita zvefundo yake. “Fundo yakakosha uye ndiwo musimboti wezvese muhupenyu saka ndinotanga ndaita zvechikoro changu, ndapedza ndochienda kumotor-cross kunoita gadziriro dzangu kana ndakatarisana nemujaho.   “Mazuva ano fundo inodiwa pazvose nekuti mune ramangwana kana ndave kuzoenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika handizive kuti zvinofamba sei saka zvakakosha kushanda nesimba kune zvose,” anodaro Mufaro.   Baba vake, Kudakwashe Kabasa uyo anove zvakare maneja wake, anoti chipo chiri pamwana wake chakakosha zvikuru. “Tinokoshesa fundo yaMufaro nemutambo uyu saka ini ndinenge ndiripo nguva dzese ndichimuendesa kuchikoro kana apedza toenda naye kunoita gadziriro dzake. Chishuwo chedu kuona achibudirira mumutambo uyu uye fundo yake achipasa zvakare,” anodaro Kabasa.
